bibl.seg: Youtie Herbert C. and Orsamus M. Pearl, Michigan Papyri. Volume IV, Part II. Tax Rolls from Karanis. Part II. Text and Indexes. (University of Michigan Studies. Humanistic Series. XLIII.)
Ann Arbor, The University of Michigan Press, 1939, 4°, xv-266 pp. et 3 pll.
P. Mich. IV, 357-363 [Nos 357-358 are fragments of P. Mich. IV, 224-225].

C.R. par BAssBudé 67 (avril 1940) p. 32. - H.I. Bell, CR 54 (1940) p. 115. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 20 (1940) pp. 101-102. - Paul Collart, REA 43 (1941) pp. 95-96; - REG 53 (1940) pp. 248-249; - RPhil 3e s., 16 (1942) p. 87. - H. Liebesny, CW 35 (1942) pp. 148-149. - Claire Préaux, ChrEg 16 (1941) No. 31, p. 144. - S.L. Wallace, AHR 46 (1941) p. 457. - C.B. Welles, AJP 44 (1940) pp. 566-567. - Ulrich Wilcken, ArchPF 14 (1941) p. 167.
